awd_titl_txt: A Study of the Regulation of Pollen Specific Genes
awd_abstract_narration: The primary objective of the project is to develop a competitive                research proposal on "The Regulation of Pollen Specific Genes".                 The planning activities will include completion of preliminary                  studies and collaboration with an established researcher.                                                                                                       Support of the project will assist a well trained black biologist               to improve her research capability and to complete the planning                 and development of a regular MRI proposal.  The planning                        activities, if successful, will significantly enhance the                       potential of the investigator to compete for MRI and other                      research support.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences

inst.inst_name: SUNY State University of New York Central Administration
